name: Kroatische Wirtschaftsvereinigung
memberOrga: KWVD has approx. 150 members from Germany and abroad. Our members are: firms, organisations, private persons etc.
goal:
Kroatische Wirtschaftsvereinigung eV (KWVD) is an economic organization founded in 2007 in Frankfurt am Main, with the aim to represent the companies operating in the German-Croatian economic area and to promote the German-Croatian economic relations. KWVD organizes economic conventions, match making and informative events, seminars, fairs for firms and entrepreneurs.
KWVD is actively involved in education by organizing training courses and practices for pupils and students. KWVD is also active in adult education by organising professional seminars for teaching / non-teaching staff. Our projects involve pupils an students from Germany and from abroad, students with an immigrant background.
interests: Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
KWVD adopted Europe 2020 strategy and we try to achieve it's goals in our everyday work:
1. Employment
2. Research and Technology
3. Climate change and energy sustainability
4. Education
5. Fighting poverty and social exclusion
